thread.section_title: The Waldorf Hilton London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good business hotel
thread.title_full: Good business hotel - Review of The Waldorf Hilton London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: FrankDoorenbosch
title: Good business hotel
text:
Like the grand feeling you get walking into the Waldorf Hilton. The service and attention is good and sometimes even too helpful.
Stayed for one night on business and the rooms are good, not big but you are in London. Breakfast is reasonable and not as expected. Can't win them all
